sections.heading: Third party defendant may bring in third personA third party defendant may proceed under Articles 1111 through 1115 against any person who is or may be liable to him for all or any part of the third party demand
sections.text: Third party defendant may bring in third personA third party defendant may proceed under Articles 1111 through 1115 against any person who is or may be liable to him for all or any part of the third party demand.
